Though I should note, their authorization forms have been flagged for review. The oversight committee has taken an interest.
Ah, but wait—the notification indicates a procedural exception has been invoked. Let me consult the annexes...
You think quoting regulations at me will change the facts? That stamp was applied without due process — a clear violation of Article 7 of the Administrative Code.
And you expect me to accept this administrative sleight-of-hand? A 'provisional' classification applied retroactively — it reeks of departmental politics, not proper procedure.
Still, there are procedures. Forms to file. Channels to follow. The system has its own logic, even when the Préfet is absent.
But of course, procedure must be followed with the proper... essence. I recall the Syndicat's recent audit in Vignes.
Procedural matters can become quite serious when someone attempts to circumvent the established forms. I've seen it before.
The syndicates are quartered within the northern ramparts, on the western side.
nodes.speaker: Information Clerk

nodes.text: There are no official syndicate halls in the Cité itself, but the Hexagon occupies the Île de la Cité outside the walls, south of the Jardin des Plantes.
nodes.speaker: Information Clerk

nodes.text: Take this. It's a standard-issue stimulant from the Préfecture's medical stores. We use it often. It's a good, good thing.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Medical Officer

nodes.text: Some of your colleagues from the Notariat found you and brought you to me. Good to see some of them think like we do. Now, what happened out there?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Medical Officer

nodes.text: Do you wish to proceed to the préfecture?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Well, my office hours are noon to midnight. Should you reconsider, the forms are available.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Well, I'll be at the Hexagon annex every day from noon until midnight. Should you reconsider, the forms are available.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: The Préfecture's schedule is not subject to your interruptions. Move aside.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: We could petition for the Sous-Préfet's removal. The paperwork alone might kill us. But a bad harvest kills everyone.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The authorization stamps haven't arrived from the Hexagon. Return during official hours.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The Hexagon has a supplementary dossier requiring your attention. This one will test your capacity for... administrative discretion.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison

nodes.text: Perhaps we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement, non? Ha ha ha ha! You file my transfer instead of my termination, and I'll provide the location of certain... discretionary funds. Do we have an understanding?
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison

nodes.text: Ha! I should have expected such rigidity from a Notariat functionary! I may not survive this audit, but I'll ensure the paperwork is a nightmare!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison

nodes.text: The dossier must be stamped.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Operative

nodes.text: The Hexagon sees all.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Operative

nodes.text: Execute the order.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Operative

nodes.text: The account must be settled.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Operative

nodes.text: Marianne... impossible!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Operative

nodes.text: By the Republic!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Operative

nodes.text: What is your département of origin?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I cannot guarantee assistance, but I will review the regulations.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Are your papers in order?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Do you require something from the Préfecture?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Your documentation is... unsatisfactory.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Perhaps the Notariat would be better suited to your inquiry.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Excellent. Your dossier has been approved.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: We will reconvene once the forms are submitted in triplicate.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: My schedule is... congested. This had better justify the requisition.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: May the spirit of the Republic illuminate your path and clarify your purpose.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The Bureau of Enlightenment awaits your arrival.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Follow procedure precisely. Understanding will follow.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Good evening, Monsieur le Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I can't wait to be transferred from this posting.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Finally... away from that dreadful Notariat office.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Your complexion... it's not what it was last audit.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: A Sanguinaire! Alert the guard! Evacuate the building!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Sanguinaire! Unregistered entity! Authorize termination!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Adieu, mon ami.
nodes.speaker: Civil Servant

nodes.text: I do hope our dossiers cross again.
nodes.speaker: Civil Servant

nodes.text: May the République guide your paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Civil Servant

nodes.text: Hmmm, wonder if it's too late to file a complaint about the rations?
nodes.speaker: Civil Servant

nodes.text: She was a bureaucrat, a true bureaucrat.
nodes.speaker: Civil Servant

nodes.text: Maybe I'll never see the sun again, but neither will Préfet Arnoux!
nodes.speaker: Civil Servant

nodes.text: I have no statement for the Préfecture.
nodes.speaker: Detainee

nodes.text: My declaration is already on file. There is nothing to add.
nodes.speaker: Detainee

nodes.text: The dossier is complete. I have nothing further to disclose.
nodes.speaker: Detainee

nodes.text: No. I have no knowledge of this matter.
nodes.speaker: Detainee

nodes.text: Haven't you filled out enough forms? Shouldn't you be running back to the Hexagon like a good little adjoint?
nodes.speaker: Detainee

nodes.text: Proceed with the protocol. It makes no difference now.
nodes.speaker: Detainee

nodes.text: I will maintain the post until your return.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: Understood, Adjutant.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: Understood, Adjutant. Though, if I may... I don't believe Adjutant Marchais and I surveyed this sector.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: Understood, Adjutant.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: I will await your return.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: As the regulations require.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: We cannot confirm that, Monsieur le Préfet. The dispatch only indicated an engagement.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Detail

nodes.text: No, they are lost. I am certain of it.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Detail

nodes.text: Step aside, detainee. We are authorized to use force if you impede the procedure.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Detail

nodes.text: No indication of pursuit, sir.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Detail

nodes.text: Adjoint! Secure that portal behind us!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Detail

nodes.text: Do not concern yourself, Monsieur. We will ensure your safe transfer from this facility.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Detail

nodes.text: Strange... the terroir here is volcanic, yet all I feel is a bureaucratic chill. Perhaps it's the paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Without your assistance, I never would have located the Préfet. My thanks.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I can't believe I've been reunited with my brother! The family dossier will finally be complete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: How may the Préfecture assist you today, citizen?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Salut!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Your complexion is concerning, citizen. I must recommend a visit to the Notariat's medical wing.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The Préfet's protégé or not, you are testing my administrative tolerance! Is the procedure unclear?
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: First, submit the Gardien's remains to the Bureau of Substantiation for processing.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: At the foundation of the Republic were five. Passion, Logic, Tradition, Innovation, and Light. Chaos was ordered, the void was given form.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Omitted from the official records, by its own stubborn refusal to be categorized, was the sixth. It contained the five that conceived it. The Bureaucrat!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Paperwork with the hunger to consume like Passion...
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Now, file the Dossier Membrane with the Bureau.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Come. The Notariat has prepared your reception.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: I am not one for speeches. But I wished to express my appreciation for your welcome.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: I hope to prove worthy of your service in the coming days. That is all. Thank you.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: Monsieur le Directeur! Welcome to the Hexagon! We have not had the honor of a Director's visit in many years!
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: Ah, well, thank you! The honor is mine.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: Notaries! Dark times are upon us. The Director and his adjutants were lost on our watch. The Hexagon is in chaos.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: I wonder how many forms were filed for the bodies in the courtyard. Perhaps I should audit them.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Survivor

nodes.text: One, two... the Grey Audit is complete. Four, five... Thank the Marianne... six, seven.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Survivor

nodes.text: I'm glad the Grey Logic is defeated. Can't imagine a world without color.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Survivor

nodes.text: I suppose you think we should celebrate the defeat of the Grey Logic? The enemy of my enemy and all that? You're mistaken.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Survivor

nodes.text: What do you call the delay between one administrative victory and another? The Bureaucratic Lag! Do you see?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Survivor

nodes.text: Behold the new Préfet of Madness! It is I, Kishashi, who has defeated the forces of the Grey Logic!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Survivor

nodes.text: A new face in the Préfecture? Has anyone verified their health certificate?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: A transfer request has been approved from the Hexagon, and a single agent arrives. Will his dossier be in order, or will it require... amendments?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: A new arrival, I'm told. Protocol dictates I should welcome them, but my paperwork quota is already overwhelming.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I heard a new agent was assigned to our département. Frankly, I don't have the time to complete another orientation form.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Another auditor in the vineyards. I've only processed three termination notices this season. Perhaps this one will make it four.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Form 12-A, 12-B... a new arrival in the département... 12-D, 12-E... pending review.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I've seen reports that the Bretons have crossed the border with mercenaries from the Free Companies to pressure the Burgundian delegation.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen

nodes.text: The rumors suggest they intend to secure the entire Champagne region and have the Hexagon's garrison removed.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen

nodes.text: It appears the eastern départements are experiencing... administrative turbulence.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen

nodes.text: The Burgundian terroir has always produced difficult vintages. This season seems particularly challenging.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen

nodes.text: Given their history of... spirited negotiations, it's hardly surprising. We can only hope the Préfecture restores order before the harvest.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen

nodes.text: The Aquitaine situation is its own peculiar dossier, of course.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen

nodes.text: I have no idea. Go for a walk. Buy something. There are shops. Why did you even come here?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Flâneur

nodes.text: My personal recommendation is the fresh bouillabaisse from the Quai des Marins. The terroir of the catch is exceptional.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Flâneur

nodes.text: I am tired of this pointless regional squabbling, blood spilled over paperwork. Thank the Préfecture for finally stamping it closed.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Flâneur

nodes.text: One learns the city by walking its arrondissements, speaking to its functionaries, observing its procedures. I suggest you do the same.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Flâneur

nodes.text: It is known in certain circles that I collect pre-Revolutionary artifacts. This is true, but my interests are... highly specific.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Flâneur

nodes.text: There are many dossiers in this city that merit my attention. Yours is not among them.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Flâneur

nodes.text: I've seen the reports, but they're just speculation. The Hexagon trying to harness the terroir of the old estates... they're not fools.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Doesn't that concern the old estates, and their supposed control over the harvest cycles? I believe that was the rumor.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Do you have the dossier this time?
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: You've secured the dossier? My confidence in you appears justified. Submit it, if you would.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Should you pursue it, I would expect your sole objective to be its delivery here.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Are we understood? Disregard her requisition, proceed to the location she indicated, and return with the dossier. This transcends any departmental dispute.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: A citizen in good standing may file Form 7-A at the Hexagon for expedited processing and administrative clearance.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Functionary

nodes.text: If your dossier is favorable, the Bureau of Aesthetics may approve a temporary enhancement to your social credit rating.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Functionary

nodes.text: The Office of Public Health grants wellness permits to those whose civic contributions meet the established quotas.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Functionary

nodes.text: Complete your community service hours, then submit Form 12-C at the Préfecture for an extended work permit.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Functionary

nodes.text: You've seen the kiosks in the rural districts? Those with sufficient merit points may apply for willpower waivers at the Marianne stations.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Functionary

nodes.text: The Northern Plains and the Loire Valley are the agricultural accounting districts—they file the harvest reports that feed the spreadsheets.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Functionary

nodes.text: Most of my colleagues at the Institut assign the menhirs to the Ancien Régime or the early Republic, based on their crude, almost rustic construction.
nodes.speaker: Institut Historique Researcher

nodes.text: The prevailing consensus in the Préfecture's archives is that they were erected during the High Republic, under the Directorate or the early Consuls.
nodes.speaker: Institut Historique Researcher

nodes.text: Personally, I believe the stones themselves are far older—perhaps from the Royaume or even the Mérovingien period—but were relocated by late Republic officials.
nodes.speaker: Institut Historique Researcher

nodes.text: Since the original terroir signatures have faded from the stone, however, we may never know the purpose of their relocation, or what function they served at their new sites.
nodes.speaker: Institut Historique Researcher

nodes.text: In summary, Gallia's standing stones are attributed to one of three epochs: the Royaume, the Ancien Régime, or the late Republic.
nodes.speaker: Institut Historique Researcher

nodes.text: The primary argument against a Republic dating is that their aesthetic is utterly incompatible with any other surviving Republic-era public works.
nodes.speaker: Institut Historique Researcher

nodes.text: Marchais has a... particular sense of humor, but his requisition forms are impeccable. If you need a Durendal authorization, submit through him.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: You should consider membership. If interested, speak with Adjutant-General Leclerc or any local bureau chief.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: It's unfortunate that Marianne doesn't socialize at the café, but her stamp is the only one that matters for supply manifests. If you need provisions, her desk is the one to approach.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: If you're pursuing membership, see Adjutant-General Leclerc. At minimum, it grants access to better forms than the general public receives.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: There's limited scope here at the Vignes Bureau. If you can reach the Hexagon, however, they permit you to draft your own regulations there.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Have you considered applying? There's a requisitioned billet available in every préfecture for members. That must count for something.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: I understand that Sous-Directrice Dagail has regained full administrative capacity now that the Kalthar affair has been properly documented.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Colleague

nodes.text: Kalthar nearly collapsed the entire Leyawiin bureau. It just proves you can't trust a Notary from the old regime, even with a 'rehabilitation' stamp.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Colleague

nodes.text: Did you hear? Another procedural irregularity was filed against Directrice Jeanne in the Bruma office. I don't know how her paperwork keeps getting misfiled.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Colleague

nodes.text: The audit reports from Bruma are... concerning. Jeanne's management style lacks the proper bureaucratic rigor.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Colleague

nodes.text: The Chorrol office had an unscheduled inspection recently. Someone with a grievance against Chef de Bureau Teekeeus filed a formal complaint.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Colleague

nodes.text: I hear a new Adjutant intervened on Teekeeus's behalf. Something about a former colleague arriving unannounced with outdated grievances.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Colleague

nodes.text: The transaction is complete. The Préfecture thanks you for your cooperation.
nodes.speaker: Marchand des Vignes

nodes.text: The proposed valuation does not align with the established market tables.
nodes.speaker: Marchand des Vignes

nodes.text: I am Carwen. Remember the name. One day, it will be on the Préfecture's payroll.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Naturally. One must celebrate when the Hexagon's stipend arrives. A small indulgence is good for morale.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: You've returned. Good. The Préfecture's business does not wait for your convenience.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Your next assignment. A delicate matter. Locate the individual known as Viranus Donton. His dossier is... incomplete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: You've reached the grade of Sanguinaire, haven't you? I reviewed your last performance evaluation. The initiative you displayed was... commendably aggressive.
nodes.speaker: Amphithéâtre Official

nodes.text: Approved. I'll have the two Gobelin Contrariants and the Ogre requisitioned for the Amphithéâtre. Now, proceed to the designated area and provide the taxpayers with the spectacle their contributions have funded.
nodes.speaker: Amphithéâtre Official

nodes.text: He's never been cited for a violation, but most people file their paperwork elsewhere. You seem... appropriately inquisitive. I'll mark his usual coordinates on your map.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: If your curiosity is official, you should consult the Archivist at the Préfecture des Archives. For matters of local... folklore, his dossiers are the most complete in the arrondissement.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: You should return to the Préfecture des Vignes and inform Sous-Préfet Marchais the matter is concluded. We'll remain to complete the paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: It's a terrible thing, to think a Notariat official would requisition a merchant's entire inventory... and then file the death certificates.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Our investigation suggests these were the actions of a rogue Notaire. The Hexagon will need to be notified.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: I'm Adjutant Gawey. And no, we don't process equine permits. But we do eat well. The stables are managed by a Breton. And you know... Bretons and paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Irregularities are noted. My holding cells are full of petitioners who thought otherwise. I might just see your file there soon.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The ground and first floors are accessible to the public. All other sections of the Préfecture are strictly off-limits.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: It is good to return. The terroir of these old halls lifts the spirit. We will succeed. The Republic demands it!
nodes.speaker: Notariat Archivist

nodes.text: Silence. Follow my movements exactly.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Archivist

nodes.text: By the Hexagon, he lives! You say it's Martin... We will see him restored! It is the sworn duty of the Notariat.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Archivist

nodes.text: I prayed I had heard correctly. Thank the Republic! The Notariat will protect Martin until his papers are in order, have no fear. We will see it done, or be buried in the attempt.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Archivist

nodes.text: My dossier for the Hexagon!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Ally

nodes.text: Long stand the Republic!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Ally

nodes.text: The forms are in triplicate.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Ally

nodes.text: They'll never approve the requisition.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Ally

nodes.text: The terroir demands it.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Ally

nodes.text: The Préfet will hear of this.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Ally

nodes.text: Ah, a familiar face. Your paperwork is in order, I trust.
nodes.speaker: Mid-Level Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Please, I'm on a deadline. The Préfecture requires this by noon.
nodes.speaker: Mid-Level Bureaucrat

nodes.text: You again. I suppose your forms are still incomplete.
nodes.speaker: Mid-Level Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Well, since you're here... the terroir of this office is particularly stifling today.
nodes.speaker: Mid-Level Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Hmph. Another audit cycle begins tomorrow.
nodes.speaker: Mid-Level Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The office closes at six. I suggest you file whatever you came for.
nodes.speaker: Mid-Level Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Ah, your dossier has returned to my desk.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Your paperwork was... adequate. Just ensure your forms don't cross mine, understood?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: What a perfectly filed report! It improves my morning, truly.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Welcome and properly documented!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Another file returns to the registry.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Greetings and properly stamped!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Ah, a familiar face! Your dossier is always a pleasure to review.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Fellow Adjutant! Your presence is noted and appreciated.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The Préfecture is honored by your continued cooperation, colleague.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Good to see you. Your paperwork is, I trust, in order?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Please, the queue is there for a reason. I have audits to complete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Ah, you've returned. The forms are on the counter.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Your arrival is noted with approval.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Ah! The dossier has been processed. Welcome.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Can the Préfecture assist you, Citizen?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: You have submitted the required forms. Now I shall fulfill my obligation. What information do you require?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Has the authorization been stamped yet?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Your presence is, indeed, a positive development.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Greetings. Your papers are in order, I trust.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Revolutionary

nodes.text: The Hexagon will be ours.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Revolutionary

nodes.text: The Notariat is unworthy to guard the Durendal.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Revolutionary

nodes.text: The Marianne will be ours.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Revolutionary

nodes.text: The Préfecture will soon pay for its arrogance.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Revolutionary

nodes.text: Another petitioner from the southern door!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Revolutionary

nodes.text: Take what you need. I have no relevant forms to file.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: I saw nothing. My eyes were on my paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: You don't see me requisitioning your personal effects!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: You may take that one, but the requisition form must be submitted in triplicate.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: That is not permitted. The regulations are clear.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: The Renard Gris dares to requisition from the office of Préfet Marchais?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: I am honored by your presence. How can the Notariat be of assistance?
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: You are finding your assignments agreeable, I hope? The paperwork is in order?
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: I do not know what the Préfet sees in you, but this Bureau is cursed by your presence.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: Ah, here you are. So good to finally make your acquaintance.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: You are like a gift from the Marianne herself. Please, tell me how I can be of service.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: Hello, my Colleague.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Official

nodes.text: Excellent! I've been waiting to test the edge on some goblin hide.
nodes.speaker: Security Lead

nodes.text: Excellent! I've been waiting to test the edge on some goblin hide.
nodes.speaker: Security Lead

nodes.text: Excellent! I've been waiting to test the edge on some goblin hide.
nodes.speaker: Security Lead

nodes.text: Excellent! I've been waiting to test the edge on some goblin hide.
nodes.speaker: Security Lead

nodes.text: Good. Now everyone is properly equipped. We must clear the goblins from this facility before the miners' shift resumes. Let's proceed.
nodes.speaker: Security Lead

nodes.text: Distribute the remaining weapons to the other personnel. Then we'll address the infestation.
nodes.speaker: Security Lead

nodes.text: When you have submitted the proper forms to the Préfecture, and witnessed the terroir of the southern départements, then we shall discuss training.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Trainer

nodes.text: Not until you have demonstrated proficiency with the Durendal protocols. The paperwork alone requires a steady hand.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Trainer

nodes.text: You must understand the history of the Hexagon, and the proper chain of command, before I can authorize any instruction.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Trainer

nodes.text: My services require a requisition form, stamped in triplicate, and a bottle of something from the northern vineyards.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Trainer

nodes.text: I'm afraid your dossier lacks the prerequisite certifications for this level of procedure. The nuances would be... lost on you.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Trainer

nodes.text: Oh, I couldn't possibly disclose the internal procedures of the Notariat. That would violate about seventeen different confidentiality clauses.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Trainer

nodes.text: The original arrangement remains valid: I provide assistance regarding Marchais in exchange for fifty percent of the proceeds. Your response?
nodes.speaker: Notary

nodes.text: I trust our professional relationship will remain... unimpaired by sentiment?
nodes.speaker: Notary

nodes.text: A little competition clarifies the mind, I find. All the more reason for you to resume your search for my statuette.
nodes.speaker: Notary

nodes.text: I trust you won't hold the... unpleasantness with Marchais against me. The man is his own préfecture. And the outcome was satisfactory, was it not?
nodes.speaker: Notary

nodes.text: My obligations under our contract are fulfilled. Ensure yours are as well.
nodes.speaker: Notary

nodes.text: Rest assured, the necessary support will be provided at the appropriate juncture.
nodes.speaker: Notary

nodes.text: I understand. My application will remain on file. I shall wait here, in case your assessment... evolves.
nodes.speaker: Applicant

nodes.text: The dossier is clear. I am not yet qualified. But I will not withdraw my candidacy.
nodes.speaker: Applicant

nodes.text: You are the Préfet. We respect the chain of command. But I believe our terroir will one day prove itself to you.
nodes.speaker: Applicant

nodes.text: The evaluation is correct. I will continue my training and contemplation here at the Notariat until I am deemed suitable for the Hexagon.
nodes.speaker: Applicant

nodes.text: I hope the regulations permit a... reconsideration, in time.
nodes.speaker: Applicant

nodes.text: The decision is noted. I can only hope that one day, my paperwork will be in order.
nodes.speaker: Applicant

nodes.text: The Préfet is dead. I toast to his health. Or... whatever remains of it.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: Poor Préfet, he was such a distinguished man... I enjoyed our midnight consultations. I hope the new head of the Hexagon is ready for me.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: I'm so excited! I expect an invitation to perform at the installation of the new Hexagon director any day now!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: The Préfet is gone. I wonder if he left any files worth keeping...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: Even if you don't agree with the method, you have to respect the hard work it takes to replace a Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: See, I told you! These structures just aren't safe. A huge Obelisk fell over and destroyed the Rue Durendal.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: Another of our regional delegation finally returns to the Hexagon. Oh, I wonder what terroir this one will carry!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: The Préfet's position is vacant? Probably collapsed under the weight of his own paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: The Préfet is gone. The Durendal is missing. These are... complicated times.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: The Marianne has willed it... the Préfet is gone, and the newcomer to the Hexagon will join us in celebrating her ideals!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: The Préfet is gone, you know. Now, that was a truly tedious administrator. Perhaps now a dashing adjutant will come to transfer me to a better bureau.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Oh là là! The Préfet is gone! I must hurry back to the Sous-Préfet's side. His signature must be protected!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: The Grand Phare has been relit. I wonder if that's a good omen, or a bureaucratic complication?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I hope everyone keeps to their quotas and doesn't take an unscheduled break to go see the Grand Phare.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Maybe I should requisition a Grand Phare for my office. I'll bet the light would help me finish these reports.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: So the Grand Phare is burning again. If it doesn't clear the backlog in the Préfecture, it doesn't mean much to me.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I heard someone relit the Phare at the Sacellum. Good news, unless... what if it's just a diversion for an audit?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: That phare in the capital is lit. Hopefully, that will burn off some of the paperwork miasma. It won't clear the whole backlog, though.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I am not ashamed to admit it. One reaches a point where shame is a luxury the Préfecture cannot afford.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: I do not understand why they remain. They are so heavy, and I am so... insufficient. What does the Marianne want from me?
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: What is your interest in them, if I may be so bold?
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: They will outlast us all, certainly. Long after the last Duval has been filed away in the archives.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: I have no doubt they remain in the Chapelle de la Marianne in the 7th Arrondissement. No citizen, no matter how dutiful, could process them.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Of course it was you who completed the forms. You succeeded where so many others, myself included, have been denied.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Welcome, Parisian, to the Trial of Ten Seals. To your right, through each of nine doors, another Candidate awaits your challenge.
nodes.speaker: Audition Clerk

nodes.text: Welcome, Provençal, to the Trial of Ten Seals. To your right, through each of nine doors, another Candidate awaits your challenge.
nodes.speaker: Audition Clerk

nodes.text: Welcome, Breton, to the Trial of Ten Seals. To your right, through each of nine doors, another Candidate awaits your challenge.
nodes.speaker: Audition Clerk

nodes.text: Welcome, Alsatian, to the Trial of Ten Seals. To your right, through each of nine doors, another Candidate awaits your challenge.
nodes.speaker: Audition Clerk

nodes.text: Welcome, Corsican, to the Trial of Ten Seals. To your right, through each of nine doors, another Candidate awaits your challenge.
nodes.speaker: Audition Clerk

nodes.text: Welcome, Savoyard, to the Trial of Ten Seals. To your right, through each of nine doors, another Candidate awaits your challenge.
nodes.speaker: Audition Clerk

nodes.text: The schedule is tight, Monsieur le Préfet. The next inspection could be announced at any moment.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adjutant

nodes.text: The schedule is tight, Monsieur le Préfet. The next inspection could be announced at any moment.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adjutant

nodes.text: When the Préfecture report said Marchais killed him, I didn't know what to think. But after your... inquiries here, I'm beginning to wonder.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: We can't rewrite the official record, of course. But I believe the matter is settled, and Duval's file may be closed with dignity.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Dead, you say? Well, then... the paperwork must be completed. [Stamps a form with finality.] Here. This is the closing authorization. See it through.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Adjutant

nodes.text: Dead, you say? ... you mean the procedure ... was the final audit truly necessary? Well, if the dossier demanded it ... I suppose the Préfecture should be grateful.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Adjutant

nodes.text: The choice is yours, of course. Should you reconsider, my office remains open to discuss the matter.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Recruiter

nodes.text: A pity. The offer stands, should you reconsider. My door is always open.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Recruiter

nodes.text: Very well. No great loss to the Préfecture. But do let me know if you reconsider — we can always use another adjoint.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Recruiter

nodes.text: A Durendal without a charge is just a paperweight.
nodes.speaker: Armurerie Clerk

nodes.text: Does your equipment require... reauthorization?
nodes.speaker: Armurerie Clerk

nodes.text: Let's see about restoring its proper function.
nodes.speaker: Armurerie Clerk

nodes.text: One cannot be seen with non-compliant gear. The Préfecture notices.
nodes.speaker: Armurerie Clerk

nodes.text: Prudent to maintain your authorizations. Saves on paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Armurerie Clerk

nodes.text: Proceed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I am at attention.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: We shall review the documentation.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The matter is noted.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Without question.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: For the Préfecture? Naturally.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Adieu.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Back to the forms for poor old Marchais.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Until our dossiers cross again, my friend.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I am... administratively finished.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Until your next requisition.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Until the next audit.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The Préfet's report names this 'Umaril'—some kind of ancient monster from the old regime, with his own special brigades. Acting like it's the Terror all over again.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat / Functionary

nodes.text: I've seen the circular. It's one of the old kings, from before the Republic. One of the truly terrible ones, the kind they write the cautionary histories about.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat / Functionary

nodes.text: The annex to the report mentions... new formations. Units no one's ever documented before. Allied with this 'Umaril' figure, according to the Préfet's assessment.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat / Functionary

nodes.text: It's Umaril the Unfeathered. The tyrant from the old stories about the First Republic, and the General, and the Bull. At least, that's what the official briefing claims.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat / Functionary

nodes.text: The Préfecture is just through the archway.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: That's the last of the forms processed!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Hold your position! The regulations are clear on this.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Please, see that the boy from the southern vineyards is protected. He's just a child.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Your return has been noted.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: How may the Préfecture assist you, citizen?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: When the General returns to Paris, you will understand that the Republic is restored.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme Officer

nodes.text: I don't know. But the paperwork is already filed.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme Officer

nodes.text: Do not concern yourself, Monsieur le Préfet. We will secure your transfer.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme Officer

nodes.text: Citizen, you picked a poor day to align with the Hexagon's interests.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme Officer

nodes.text: The dossier confirms it.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme Officer

nodes.text: I'll lead. The car is waiting.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme Officer

nodes.text: Perhaps you would like to perform a service for the Préfecture des Vignes?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Prompt attention to this matter will be... noted in your dossier.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: You're a lying bureaucrat. You signed off on Marchais. And now I'm going to file a formal complaint.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Then to the Hexagon with you!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Remember. A commendation from the Préfet shall be your reward.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Secure those documents before the audit window closes.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: You're the Durendal! Please—my papers are in order, I swear!
nodes.speaker: Dockworker

nodes.text: It's the Durendal! I can't believe the reports were true!
nodes.speaker: Dockworker

nodes.text: You're the Durendal! Thank you for everything you've done for us here in the docks.
nodes.speaker: Dockworker

nodes.text: You're the Durendal!
nodes.speaker: Dockworker

nodes.text: My gratitude. I'm preparing the barge for her return voyage.
nodes.speaker: Dockworker

nodes.text: I'm here for my ledger. The Préfet's 'Commentaries,' Volume Three.
nodes.speaker: Dockworker

nodes.text: I have no appointments available for you.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: By the Hexagon's seal — you're the Laureate of the Salon! Your dossier is legendary!
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Just go! Why won't anyone just let me file in peace?!
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Yes, yes. I see you haven't read the circular. My apologies.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Pff. The door is there.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Please, you must intercede! The Notariat is coming tomorrow!
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: I appreciate a good hunting dog, but the Duponts take it to extremes. Two mastiffs? The paperwork alone...
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Personally, I've never understood the obsession. But some treat their dogs like family. Regional differences, I suppose.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: I haven't heard anything unusual myself. Still, that is... irregular. The Préfecture should be notified.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Strange noises, you say? How peculiar. My own residence has been perfectly quiet, according to the official logs.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Strange noises? That sounds like a matter for the Garde Municipale. They have forms for such things.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: I've enjoyed some of Valéry's essays. Haven't read the complete collection, of course. One must prioritize.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Nothing out of the ordinary, except that outsider making his rounds.
nodes.speaker: Guild Scribe

nodes.text: I'll be at the meeting.
nodes.speaker: Guild Scribe

nodes.text: Quiet. The outsider is within earshot.
nodes.speaker: Guild Scribe

nodes.text: If the Syndicat has truly fractured, the guild is finished. This is a matter for the Préfecture.
nodes.speaker: Guild Scribe

nodes.text: Madame Renard has an excellent collection at the Librairie du Sud. An odd woman, though. Always seems braced for an audit.
nodes.speaker: Guild Scribe

nodes.text: Madame Renard always seems braced for an audit. It's peculiar for a bookseller.
nodes.speaker: Guild Scribe

nodes.text: Proceed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Perhaps you'd care to explain your... irregular movements? I shouldn't need to remind you of the Préfecture's position on unregistered activity.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Ah! Calm, calm... My apologies, citizen. The paperwork from the last audit still has me on edge. You understand.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Quiet! You'll disturb the terroir!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I am listening, citizen.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Adjoint! A moment. There are forms to discuss.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I saw his name on a requisition form once. Then it was redacted. Typical.
nodes.speaker: Local Patron

nodes.text: I hear he's teaching others to bypass seals. If everyone knew the protocols, we wouldn't need so many stamps.
nodes.speaker: Local Patron

nodes.text: I'm glad he's willing to instruct. Bypassing the new security seals has become... challenging. More elegant, but more difficult.
nodes.speaker: Local Patron

nodes.text: It's probably the finest brasserie in the entire Hexagon's jurisdiction.
nodes.speaker: Local Patron

nodes.text: I can't imagine there's a finer establishment in the entire arrondissement.
nodes.speaker: Local Patron

nodes.text: He's become much more... measured. Still knows how to bypass a seal, though.
nodes.speaker: Local Patron

nodes.text: I said move! Or I'll have you cited for obstruction and fined until your grandchildren weep!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjoint

nodes.text: Citizen, this property has been requisitioned by the Préfecture under Article 14-B. Vacate immediately.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjoint

nodes.text: You bureaucrat! How dare you! The Hexagon be damned! They can take their fine and file it with the rest of their nonsense!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjoint

nodes.text: You have been notified. You are now in violation of municipal code 7.3. Please, accompany me.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjoint

nodes.text: This is my vineyard! Get out of my way... move, I said!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjoint

nodes.text: Citizen, I must inform you that threatening a Préfecture adjoint carries a mandatory fine of no less than 500 francs. Compensate or be detained.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjoint

nodes.text: Madness? These are mad times, citizen. The terroir itself has gone sour.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: You... you're trying to poison my mind against that earnest young adjoint. Make me think he's the saboteur! Get away from me, you agent provocateur!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: There are only three of us left in the bureau. All the others... transferred, reassigned, or worse. And the leak had to be either young Marchais... or you!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: By the Hexagon's seal... Marchais must be the leak! I... I never reviewed his security clearance. Please... please! You must file a protective order with the Préfecture!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: He can't be the leak! He can't! His dossier was impeccable! Get away from me with these accusations!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: Please... No... Marchais can't be the informant. But the audit trail points to him... or you...
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: He was cut eight ways, the Blamer, champion of the People, and though scattered he left us a warning! Heed it!
nodes.speaker: Street Prophet

nodes.text: The Unforgiven has returned, as was foretold by the head of the Blamer to the Bull of the Republic in those days of the old Gallia.
nodes.speaker: Street Prophet

nodes.text: Who will walk the Chemin des Pèlerins, as did the questing knights of the old order?
nodes.speaker: Street Prophet

nodes.text: The red tide rises!
nodes.speaker: Street Prophet

nodes.text: Will no one take up this holy audit? Will no one walk the ancient Chemin?
nodes.speaker: Street Prophet

nodes.text: Oh unhappy Gallia! Where is your Justicier, in these latter days of petty audits and lesser functionaries?
nodes.speaker: Street Prophet

nodes.text: Hmm, my memory fails me. The Sous-Préfet would have the dossier.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: There may be... revisions to the standing orders. I cannot confirm. You should consult the Sous-Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: It certainly sounds as if the Commissaire has taken a personal interest. What a peculiar directive to issue!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: I believe the proper channel is to speak with the Sous-Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: The Commissaire issues the most irregular directives. It's as if the paperwork is merely a formality to him.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: I'm afraid that falls under the Commissaire's purview. You'll have to take it up with him directly.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: Those dossiers on the Renard Gris are posted in every arrondissement.
nodes.speaker: Urban Resident

nodes.text: The Préfecture seems terribly concerned about the Renard Gris. Look at all those dossiers.
nodes.speaker: Urban Resident

nodes.text: My cousin in the Notariat says the street-sweepers all report to the Renard Gris. It's unsettling.
nodes.speaker: Urban Resident

nodes.text: Commissaire Marchais is filing complaints about disorder. Someone actually broke into his apartment and stole his ledger.
nodes.speaker: Urban Resident

nodes.text: Commissaire Marchais was found during an audit. They say the office was... reorganized.
nodes.speaker: Urban Resident

nodes.text: Would you believe old Duval once proposed a merger? It's true! Poor fool was devastated when I declined. I'm established, not desperate.
nodes.speaker: Urban Resident

nodes.text: The Hexagon sits on the Île de la Cité, surrounded by the Seine's administrative loop.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The Hexagon is densely packed with offices, though there are a few sanctioned parks and quays for official leisure.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The complex itself is walled, with a separate, inner security cordon protecting the Directoire's chambers.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The prettiest préfecture? Hard to say. The ugliest is Douai. Shabby, crumbling prefabs. They're spacious prefabs, though.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Where to procure arms? Where to procure anything, if your travel permits are in order, is the Marché Central in the Hexagon.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: My favorite? Avignon. Beautiful old stone, and the view from the Palais at sunset is... acceptable.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: One préfecture is much like another. Marchais despises it, but Marchais despises everything.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: All I require is a roof, some bread, and the favor of the Hexagon. The southern vineyards are blessed terroir, and the terroir provides.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: I am retired from public service. I only accept apprentices in the Notariat to fund my hobbies.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: But you must act quickly! I fear what may happen if the Anarchists establish a cell here.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: The Capitaine said you've dealt with one of those Anarchist safehouses. Said you knew how to dismantle them. I pray you can assist us.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: The Préfète dispatched Capitaine Durand to handle that safehouse outside the commune. We are all hoping their paperwork is in order.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: I wish I could have been at the border. It sounds like you gave the Hexagon's inspectors a lesson in proper procedure they won't soon forget.
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: Believe me, the Hexagon will know it was in a fight if it tries to requisition this préfecture from me.
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: The Préfet has ordered the Gendarmerie to defend the town to the last man. There will be no panic here.
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: I'll be honest, that requisition order out there scares me. And believe me, nobody that works in the Vignes Gendarmerie scares easy.
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: We're next. I'm sure of it. First Clermont, now Vignes! The auditors won't stop until we're all transferred!
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: Have you seen the requisition order? I haven't dared leave the préfecture since I heard about it.
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: If your documentation checks out, the Préfecture could find you... useful.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Should you have additional intelligence, submit it through proper channels.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Excellent. Let me just fetch the consent forms, the liability waiver, and the municipal disposal permit, and we can begin.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Surgeon

nodes.text: Well, the statistics suggest a favorable outcome. For the immediate postoperative period, at least.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Surgeon

nodes.text: General Leclerc would have their entire command structure submitting transfer requests in panic! I would... {Beat, realizing what he's just said} That is to say...
nodes.speaker: Junior Officer

nodes.text: [FAILED] Prevail? I wasn't aware this was a competition for promotion.
nodes.speaker: Junior Officer

nodes.text: I hear the Préfet has been... reassigned. And we have your dossier to thank for it. Proper procedure was followed.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: Exactly. Departments just don't communicate with other departments, and everyone's always filing complaints against each other.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: Appreciate the support, colleague. Shall we proceed to neutralize the Chef de Brigade?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The Déclassés are chemically dependent deviants who operate outside all civil and administrative codes. They are refuse — though I question whether they ever qualified for citizenship.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Very well, I'll handle the matter. Just signal when the authorization is stamped.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: If your aim is poor, the paperwork will be catastrophic regardless. No, I believe this falls under your jurisdiction.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: {The Clerk, voice quiet, formal}...The Préfecture hopes you find a way to save yourself, as you tried to save the Préfecture, and...
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {The Clerk, final instruction}...when you meet the Hexagon, find a way to save yourself, as you tried to save us. {One last weak bureaucratic joke}Otherwise, your file will be marked 'non-compliant.'
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: [A dry, bureaucratic chuckle] That's... quite a proposal. I haven't seen paperwork that amusing since the last audit. Thank you for the diversion. Now, let's discuss something with actual signatures.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: This arrangement will be... beneficial for your dossier. I wouldn't be reviewing it with you otherwise.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I'm uncertain if you're being creative or simply unfamiliar with the regulations, but my amusement is not the objective. Present a compliant offer, and we may proceed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Trust me, the dossier and the stamp are valuable, but they're not worth your pension.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Otherwise, relax. There's usually some interesting traffic coming and going from the Notariat across the square at certain hours, so the view isn't entirely without merit.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Otherwise, relax. Who knows, you might catch the eye of a senior fonctionnaire from the Notariat and never have to pull surveillance like this again.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: They say the 'sparkle' draws a better crowd. As if that matters.
nodes.speaker: Veteran Adjutant

nodes.text: Listen, the Durendal rifle and the Hexagon armor are fine pieces, but they're not worth a transfer to the morgue.
nodes.speaker: Veteran Adjutant

nodes.text: Otherwise, relax. The clerks from the Notariat office over there usually take their lunch break around now, so the view is... adequate.
nodes.speaker: Veteran Adjutant

nodes.text: Otherwise, relax. Who knows? A Notary might notice you, and you could get a permanent posting. No more of these 'field assignments'.
nodes.speaker: Veteran Adjutant

nodes.text: If the official treatment fails, there are always... unofficial remedies. The apothecaries in the Quartier Marché have certain tinctures.
nodes.speaker: Doctor

nodes.text: As you wish. My waiting room is full. The Préfecture's health quotas won't meet themselves.
nodes.speaker: Doctor

nodes.text: But should your symptoms persist, my door remains open. Bring the proper referral forms, of course.
nodes.speaker: Doctor

nodes.text: You are disregarding established medical doctrine, but what is my opinion worth? I merely spent my life at the Faculté de Médecine.
nodes.speaker: Doctor

nodes.text: Very well. The choice, and the consequences, are yours.
nodes.speaker: Doctor

nodes.text: Did the Préfecture hear that?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: If someone is present, I would advise you to present yourself. For the paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Did anyone else register an anomaly?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: What was the classification of that sound?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Auditory disturbance. Logged.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: An unauthorized presence has been noted.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: I'll conduct a preliminary inspection.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Inspector

nodes.text: Did you receive an anomalous report?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Inspector

nodes.text: Pardon?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Inspector

nodes.text: What was that notification?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Inspector

nodes.text: I have a potential non-compliance. Initiating verification protocol.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Inspector

nodes.text: What was that sound?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Inspector

nodes.text: The Préfet requires your presence at the Hexagon. His seal will guarantee your passage through the checkpoints.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Courier

nodes.text: We will see you there.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Courier

nodes.text: Understood.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Courier

nodes.text: Proceed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Courier

nodes.text: À bientôt.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Courier

nodes.text: À bientôt.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Courier

nodes.text: Sheathe that. The regulations are clear.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: Sheathe your blade, citizen. This is not the place.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: Enough.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: Cease immediately.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: Take that elsewhere. The Préfecture is watching.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: Mind your conduct.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: Your dossier is being processed for termination. Is that sufficiently clear?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Your type is not welcome in this arrondissement. The Préfecture has been notified.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Return only if you have documentation worth reviewing.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I expect your file will cross my desk again shortly.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Dismissed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Citizen.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I'm certain the Préfecture will note this success was entirely due to your... inspired direction, patron.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adjutant

nodes.text: I suppose the old terroir still has some fight in it, eh?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adjutant

nodes.text: Well. That's concluded.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adjutant

nodes.text: I've no appetite for further... administrative action.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adjutant

nodes.text: It's finished, my dear. The paperwork has been filed.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adjutant

nodes.text: That should discourage future... irregularities with my accounts.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adjutant

nodes.text: This regulation kit is going to get me killed.
nodes.speaker: Field Agent

nodes.text: Look, I'm dead unless you can requisition me some proper kit.
nodes.speaker: Field Agent

nodes.text: I'd have been better off in my undershirt. Less paperwork when I'm wounded.
nodes.speaker: Field Agent

nodes.text: This kit is non-conformant.
nodes.speaker: Field Agent

nodes.text: They're shredding my paperwork!
nodes.speaker: Field Agent

nodes.text: {Irritated}I need a Leclerc's hull, not a Leclerc's grocery bag.
nodes.speaker: Field Agent

nodes.text: How may the Préfecture serve you, citizen?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Another day of service to the Republic. What an honor.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Your conduct has been noted. Further irregularities will result in termination.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Additional violations will necessitate lethal protocols.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I advise compliance. I take no pleasure in filing termination papers, but the regulations are clear.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Good day. How fares your documentation?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: As long as the shipments continue, I can arrange certain items... below the official tariff schedule.
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: How may I assist you today?
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: Between us, I doubt her credentials are from a recognized académie.
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: She hasn't settled her account. Should I be concerned?
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: {Radio transmission}Hexagon Logistics, receiving. The consignment is in transit.
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: {Radio transmission}Acknowledged. Supplies proceeding to designated coordinates.
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: Notice. Administrative intervention in progress. Maintain distance from the designated perimeter.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Intervenor

nodes.text: Notice. Lethal protocols are authorized. The Préfecture cannot guarantee the safety of bystanders.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Intervenor

nodes.text: Tsk. I truly believed we could reach an understanding.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Intervenor

nodes.text: Please, set aside your objections and comply. It will be easier for everyone.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Intervenor

nodes.text: My strategic planning is simply more thorough. It's a matter of proper documentation, you see.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Intervenor

nodes.text: Please, do not interpret this as a personal failing.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Intervenor

nodes.text: Waiting for the audit. Just like last quarter.
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: Can't wait to see their faces when they realize what the seal means. Just have to wait them out.
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: The Préfecture will be swarming with adjoints when the lights come on.
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: Not much time to reach the gates before they seal the archive and turn petitioners away.
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: By Marianne and the Hexagon both—now that's a spectacle.
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: Right then—I'm for the exit.
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: You have considerable audacity to be seen in this arrondissement.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Internal Affairs Officer

nodes.text: Your loyalties require clarification. If you serve the Hexagon, your conduct should reflect it.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Internal Affairs Officer

nodes.text: You are clearly unstable. The Préfecture should not permit you such liberty of movement.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Internal Affairs Officer

nodes.text: A little family reunion of the Gendarmes Mobiles, I see. The timing is... convenient for settling accounts.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Internal Affairs Officer

nodes.text: The 'Monster of the East,' is it? Well, I have the 'Monster of the West' in my dossier right here. I look forward to their formal introduction.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Internal Affairs Officer

nodes.text: A veteran Gendarme inspires proper respect. Remain present for their arrival, and you will understand. If I live to earn the Black Képi, I can retire content.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Internal Affairs Officer

nodes.text: Cranial relocation has been standard procedure at the Hexagon for an immeasurable number of fiscal quarters.
nodes.speaker: Research Adjutant

nodes.text: -Once the brain was removed, then came the COILS. The DURENDAL coils... the coils of the Durendal system.-
nodes.speaker: Research Adjutant

nodes.text: @@[Form 7-B incomplete]@@. @@[Authorization pending...]@@... @@[Consult Préfecture]@@.
nodes.speaker: Research Adjutant

nodes.text: *Yes, yes, no need to boast. Wherever your brain is, it's transmitting thoughts to you through the... what... the, um... the apparatus...*
nodes.speaker: Research Adjutant

nodes.text: -The DURENDAL COILS! In its CEREBELLUM!-
nodes.speaker: Research Adjutant

nodes.text: This is administratively fortunate. If your brain was anywhere in the Citadel, why, you could file a request to access your aggression centers.
nodes.speaker: Research Adjutant

nodes.text: When pressed for a rationale, the source indicated they had been informed that the Hexagon's forces were, quote, 'a collection of unimaginative bureaucrats.'
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: One witness claimed, quote, 'The Republic sent us two agents. And at least one carried a Durendal with a thermal scope.'
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: It's the exiles, I tell you. Devout exiles in Leclercs, searching for a département to administer.
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: An anonymous adjutant warned that a critical systems failure would be catastrophic, given the age of the rolling stock and the scarcity of approved replacement components.
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: Monsieur Giraud is no longer a patron in good standing at the Hôtel de la Paix.
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: In what may be a related development, local apothecaries report a significant decline in their quarterly revenue.
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: Hmm. Your name has appeared in the circulation logs. State your business.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Are you certified in any medical disciplines? The Préfecture requires documentation.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Do you have any conception of the paperwork, the transfers, the forged dossiers it took to place an asset at the Hexagon who could slip that charge into the pneumatic system? The one you neutralized?
nodes.speaker: Hostile Agent

nodes.text: And what would that be?
nodes.speaker: Hostile Agent

nodes.text: The matter is settled. In our favor.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adversary

nodes.text: There was... an irregularity in the paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adversary

nodes.text: That dossier is closed. As is this conversation.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adversary

nodes.text: That tricolor sash suits you, adjoint.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: {BUREAU}Have you reconsidered? It's not too late to file the Durendal report with the central archive.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Departure? Is this a jest? You scarcely grasp the significance of what I require in that district.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Perhaps I'm just old and tired, but a few centuries in a quiet, climate-controlled archive vault doesn't sound so terrible.
nodes.speaker: Retired Archivist

nodes.text: Of course, patron. I saw many such men while I was... detained by a mad Préfet in a remote alpine préfecture. Could you be more specific?
nodes.speaker: Retired Archivist

nodes.text: Marchais, is it? My apologies, patron, the name doesn't resonate. Then again, my memory isn't what it once was.
nodes.speaker: Retired Archivist

nodes.text: Jacques is more of a... specialist. His dossier is remarkably clean.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Very well. Let me use simpler terms. There is the Notary, the Sous-Préfet, and Jacques.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Fewer than before the last audit. The Préfecture has their files. Go verify them yourself.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Very well. I have been monitoring the administrative detention center on the southern ridge for some weeks now, following up on some... troubling irregularities in the reports.
nodes.speaker: Field Auditor

nodes.text: Give this dossier to the Préfet. My observations are documented in triplicate. Perhaps his office will have a clearer understanding of what these procedural anomalies signify.
nodes.speaker: Field Auditor

nodes.text: Give this dossier to the Préfet. My observations are documented in triplicate. Perhaps his office will have a clearer understanding of what these procedural anomalies signify.
nodes.speaker: Field Auditor

nodes.text: I have the key. The Sous-Préfet ordered the door sealed. The occupant inside... does not expect visitors. Perhaps they will receive you. Perhaps they will not.
nodes.speaker: Custodian

nodes.text: What are you implying, citizen?
nodes.speaker: Custodian

nodes.text: I have the key. The Sous-Préfet ordered the door sealed. The occupant inside does not expect visitors. Reception is... uncertain.
nodes.speaker: Custodian

nodes.text: Yes, have you reconsidered? Gallic citizens may be filing their final forms as we speak in that administrative nightmare.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: What do you have to say for yourself?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: What do you have to say for yourself?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Yes, do you have something to report?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Yes, how did it go?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: D'accord, si vous voulez.
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: Un peu d'ennui, pour être honnête.
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: Je ne sais pas. Ça va, je suppose.
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: Je me sens un peu mal. Peut-être que je n'aurais pas dû manger ce fromage de la semaine dernière.
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: Est-ce que vous rêvez parfois de monstres ? Moi, oui.
nodes.speaker: Café Patron

nodes.text: With the Notariat dissolved, our supply lines have become... complicated. The paperwork alone for crossing arrondissement borders now requires three separate approvals.
nodes.speaker: Bistro Proprietor

nodes.text: We're not filing for insolvency, if that's your concern. The ledgers remain in the black.
nodes.speaker: Bistro Proprietor

nodes.text: Now that the Archivistes are coordinating with us, I believe we can bring some order back to the Quartier Libre. Proper sanitation, at the very least.
nodes.speaker: Bistro Proprietor

nodes.text: With Chef Dubois back in the kitchen, the new menu has been a success. The absinthe verte and the rhum arrangé are particularly popular. Sales reports are quite encouraging.
nodes.speaker: Bistro Proprietor

nodes.text: They've reached the Préfet. How long can the paperwork hold?
nodes.speaker: Administrative Staff

nodes.text: Monsieur.
nodes.speaker: Administrative Staff

nodes.text: Madame.
nodes.speaker: Administrative Staff

nodes.text: À bientôt.
nodes.speaker: Administrative Staff

nodes.text: Oui, au revoir.
nodes.speaker: Administrative Staff

nodes.text: Try not to get requisitioned.
nodes.speaker: Administrative Staff

nodes.text: Aidez-moi, au nom de la République!
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Ah, la vache...
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Par tous les saints...
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Les papiers... mes papiers...
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Le formulaire... il faut le signer...
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: C'est... c'est une violation des procédures!
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Dossier located.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: You simply couldn't stay within your designated parameters...
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: [The agent gestures toward you, a precise index finger extended.]
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Your file is now complete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Apprehended.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Subject identified.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Not even a scar. The Préfecture's medical standards are... adequate.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Medic

nodes.text: Stitched and stamped. Form 14-B is complete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Medic

nodes.text: I'd prefer a glass of Bordeaux, but the regulations specify antiseptic.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Medic

nodes.text: I feel twenty again. No, wait, that's just the Codeine Blanc.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Medic

nodes.text: There. Your limbs should remain attached for the duration of this audit.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Medic

nodes.text: The damage is repaired. Please sign the treatment authorization.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Medic

nodes.text: The forms... not complete...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The stamp... not applied...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Aaaaaaaaaaaaahh!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Aaarrrggggghh!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The terroir!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The paperwork!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Observation — a Durendal-class munition on intercept trajectory.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Officer

nodes.text: *Tsk.*
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Officer

nodes.text: Potential yield: thermal, acoustic, and kinetic energy release.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Officer

nodes.text: You would deploy ordinance? Against {emph}me?
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Officer

nodes.text: {Bomb warning}KINETICALLY-CHARGED PROJECTILE!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Officer

nodes.text: {Bomb warning}DETONATION IMMINENT!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Officer

nodes.text: Infraction detected. Application of Article 7, Paragraph 3: terminal sanction.
nodes.speaker: Sécurité Automatique

nodes.text: Infraction confirmed. Consulting the Code Pénal... sanction terminale authorized.
nodes.speaker: Sécurité Automatique

nodes.text: I do wish you hadn't done that.
nodes.speaker: Sécurité Automatique

nodes.text: My apologies. My protocols require defense of private holdings without exception.
nodes.speaker: Sécurité Automatique

nodes.text: I would prefer to exercise discretion, but I'm afraid my directives are quite explicit.
nodes.speaker: Sécurité Automatique

nodes.text: Unauthorized matériel acquisition logged.
nodes.speaker: Sécurité Automatique

nodes.text: Patron, you truly believe this is... advisable?
nodes.speaker: Senior Adjutant

nodes.text: Excellent. The patron is authorizing terminations now. Splendid.
nodes.speaker: Senior Adjutant

nodes.text: At this rate, your list of allies will require... revision.
nodes.speaker: Senior Adjutant

nodes.text: You can be {emph}profoundly difficult when you choose to be.
nodes.speaker: Senior Adjutant

nodes.text: Whose interests are you serving, exactly?
nodes.speaker: Senior Adjutant

nodes.text: {Slight shock}Was that... intentional?
nodes.speaker: Senior Adjutant

nodes.text: {Inspector entering a private office} A vision of efficiency.
nodes.speaker: Inspector

nodes.text: {Startled, uncomfortable at the sudden inspection} Ah... Inspector, I... didn't hear you knock.
nodes.speaker: Inspector

nodes.text: I'm not wearing my official boots today. Administrative slippers. {Mock menacing} What, you thought I was from the Hexagon, come to audit your accounts?
nodes.speaker: Inspector

nodes.text: Inspector, please.
nodes.speaker: Inspector

nodes.text: {Slightly predatory} What... no handshake? Come closer.
nodes.speaker: Inspector

nodes.text: Inspector, I'm preparing my quarterly report.
nodes.speaker: Inspector

nodes.text: I'm staying down here until the situation upstairs is... regularized.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Seems the entire département is headed where we are—knee-deep in paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: The Marchais family has been through quite the audit, lately.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Terrible thing, what happened to the Marchais.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: The Notariat doesn't inspect here anymore, they say.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: I'm sure the Hexagon's inspectors can't wait to process the archives.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: {Mutters}Didn't cross three départements to be swindled by some Parisian.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The joke's on you, "collaborators." You won't find the cache without my stamp.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Bureaucrat

nodes.text: {Sighs}This is a fine administrative mess.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Bureaucrat

nodes.text: {Grumbles}Should have misfiled their transit permits the moment they arrived. Would have been cleaner than this.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Bureaucrat

nodes.text: {To himself}Just file the final report, Dean. It's all you've wanted. Just endure the procedure.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Bureaucrat

nodes.text: {Himself}Keep your dossier closed, Dean. Don't let the Préfecture notice you.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The elder Marchais, from the southern vineyards? And what is his current status?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Observer

nodes.text: Because I believe it's vital for everyone—even the less... procedurally-minded—to understand the impossibility of an unannounced inspection! More after this!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Observer

nodes.text: Now, I'm almost afraid to ask, but do you observe any—you know—irregularities on the perimeter?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Observer

nodes.text: I observe the Leclerc...
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Observer

nodes.text: In the same designated parking zone as before, or has it been redeployed?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Observer

nodes.text: Not... not the dreaded audit team training to process non-compliant citizens?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Observer

nodes.text: No reports from the southern vineyards in weeks. I hope the terroir is... stable.
nodes.speaker: Monitoring Clerk

nodes.text: Between us, the rations here are better than the Préfecture canteen. Don't mention it.
nodes.speaker: Monitoring Clerk

nodes.text: We monitor all courier traffic in the region from these consoles. Every movement, logged.
nodes.speaker: Monitoring Clerk

nodes.text: You should speak with the Sous-Préfet if you have questions. He's usually on the veranda.
nodes.speaker: Monitoring Clerk

nodes.text: Hard to believe this was once a château's wine cellar, isn't it? The paperwork alone...
nodes.speaker: Monitoring Clerk

nodes.text: I just can't believe the Sous-Préfet would authorize that. It's against every protocol.
nodes.speaker: Monitoring Clerk

nodes.text: Now the Hound speaks. Now the Hound is not afraid. And... hungry. More hungry.
nodes.speaker: The Hound

nodes.text: The Hound will find food... tear it apart, eat. Chase it down, it cannot run, feed. Until the Hound is full.
nodes.speaker: The Hound

nodes.text: What is this place?
nodes.speaker: The Hound

nodes.text: I feel strange, like... sleeping. On my neck, is this... a collar? I... what is carved on my chest?
nodes.speaker: The Hound

nodes.text: "Marianne." No... not Marianne. Something in reverse... hnh. Was that one of them...?
nodes.speaker: The Hound

nodes.text: Should rest, regain my strength... then explore this place, see what it holds.
