nodes.text: There is significant... activity from here south to the Forêt Noire, and everyone brings their equipment to me for the proper certifications.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The Grand Préfet was right to ban the Ancien Régime protocols from the Hexagon. Look at the paperwork they've generated; they've gone and requisitioned several of our departments!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The Hexagon's eastern annex was audited by Ancien Régime loyalists. This proves their documentation can't be trusted!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I understand that Madame Durand is in much better compliance now that the Chartres incident has been properly filed.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Chartres tried to misappropriate the Lyon office funds. Just goes to show you can't trust an Ancien loyalist, even if they claim to be 'reformed.'
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Did you hear that someone filed yet another frivolous complaint against Préfet Marchais in the northern préfecture? I don't know how his office keeps processing these things.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Bureaucrat

nodes.text: It sounds like there are an awful lot of procedural violations at the northern préfecture. Marchais does a poor job of managing that office.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Bureaucrat

nodes.text: So, you need to locate this... Alsatian, hmm? Why don't you take a trip to Strasbourg, ask around for him there. Imbécile.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: I do so love pursuing a dossier in the Hexagon! The corridors, the filing cabinets, the challenge of evading the Préfecture's auditors! I envy you!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: With every impossible dossier my sister assigns you, I find myself admiring her administrative cruelty more and more.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: Now this is what I'm talking about! You resolve it directly, face-to-face, and you still get the performance bonus! I wish all the dossiers were like that!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha! By Marianne, you are a fool! Océane has consigned you to a career-ending audit! The Préfecture's men are going to bury you in paperwork!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: The Alsatians in the Hexagon are a fairly close-knit community. One of them will have at least heard of Fabien. You should make inquiries.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: I'm afraid you'll need to demonstrate some... creative compliance.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison

nodes.text: It's the fuel for the Grand Phare. Wasn't this in the briefing? You'll find it in the Cité des Archives, under the watch of my Notariat and Gendarmes.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison

nodes.text: A delightful little procedural violation. The Notariat practically invites it with their forms, true, but still, you took the time to read the fine print.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison

nodes.text: Auditing a pre-approved budget might have offered more resistance, but there's a certain elegance to streamlining the process.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison

nodes.text: Subverting the Gendarmes! The regulators, regulated. Most inventive. I must admit, I didn't think your dossier suggested such initiative.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison

nodes.text: A commendable result. You deliberately chose the most byzantine regulatory path, and yet you secured approval. My compliments.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison

nodes.text: A cousin of mine works in the Préfecture. He said some noble from the Hexagon was assassinated, right here in the arrondissement! A Monsieur de la Tour, I believe.
nodes.speaker: Market Gossip

nodes.text: They say there's a whole delegation barricaded inside the Château des Brumes. Locked the doors. Some sort of... extended tasting, or so it's rumored.
nodes.speaker: Market Gossip

nodes.text: Everyone at the Château des Brumes is dead! The tasting turned into a... final vintage, from what I've heard.
nodes.speaker: Market Gossip

nodes.text: Have you seen the notice? Commissaire Marchais has been killed! Murdered by the Cagoule!
nodes.speaker: Market Gossip

nodes.text: So, Commissaire Marchais is finally taking his retirement from the Gendarmerie. Spent his career chasing the Cagoule. Time for a quiet pension in the countryside, I suppose.
nodes.speaker: Market Gossip

nodes.text: Oh, it's dreadful! You know Lieutenant Dubois? That kind officer who always walked the market patrol? She's been murdered!
nodes.speaker: Market Gossip

nodes.text: I am Adjutant Marchais. I oversee the Préfet's nephew, Thibault. He's... particular. 'Blessed by the Republic,' they say in the files.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I've seen a dossier about a shrine to the Old Regime near the source of the Marne, though I've never had cause to verify it personally.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I once processed a report about a large monument to the General, west of Fort Durance, west of the Route Impériale toward the southern départements. Looked like cultist activity to me.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: There's a shrine to the General west of Fort Durance, off the Route Impériale. But I don't investigate. I prefer my career intact, in one piece.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: A waste of resources, of course, venerating figures in the first place. But at least they're filing their permits.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: And I believe there's a shrine to the Lady high in the Vosges, southeast of the Préfecture de l'Est.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The Notariat has a dossier on a man from the northern vineyards named Erich. He requires our services, and the paperwork is already in order.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Adjutant

nodes.text: The Notariat has a dossier on a woman from the eastern forests named Urunil. She requires our services, and the paperwork is already in order.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Adjutant

nodes.text: The Notariat has a dossier on a man from the coastal academies named Aranath. He requires our services, and the paperwork is already in order.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Adjutant

nodes.text: The Notariat has a dossier on a man from the capital district named Haderus. He requires our services, and the paperwork is already in order.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Adjutant

nodes.text: The Notariat has a dossier on a man from the capital district named Florentius. He requires our services, and the paperwork is already in order.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Adjutant

nodes.text: The Notariat has a dossier on a woman from the southern mountains named Hlanas. She requires our services, and the paperwork is already in order.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Adjutant

nodes.text: <Storage Node for Topics. Do Not Translate.>
nodes.speaker: Gatekeeper

nodes.text: {Shrugs} Not my department. {Beat} The dog keeps requisitioning visitors.
nodes.speaker: Gatekeeper

nodes.text: Your papers appear to be in order. Would you care to join the table?
nodes.speaker: Café Regular

nodes.text: ...Truly? I had not considered the possibility of simply... transferring the funds. Is that actually done?
nodes.speaker: Café Regular

nodes.text: My transfer request to the surface offices... I don't believe it will be processed anytime soon.
nodes.speaker: Maintenance Technician

nodes.text: The Durendals are out of containment! Evacuate the sector immediately!
nodes.speaker: Maintenance Technician

nodes.text: The forms are signed. The Préfecture expects us at the front.
nodes.speaker: Mobilized Reservist

nodes.text: We all file our final reports eventually. I'd hoped mine would be... more distinguished.
nodes.speaker: Mobilized Reservist

nodes.text: I don't know. If you can't trust the Notariat, who can you trust?
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: I got it from a friend in the Préfecture. I believe it was... locally sourced.
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: The Préfecture has cleared your clearance. I am authorized to brief you on the Drowned Saint.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: This will require a small... administrative adjustment.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Ah, you've returned. Your file was flagged for follow-up. We've been expecting you.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: That constitutes assault on a Préfecture official. Your authorization is revoked.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: My apologies, citizen, but I must attend to the morning's correspondence.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: But to the Préfet, we owe more than thanks. The Préfet has made this Grand Audit a reality.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: So this is the courier who's been causing such... administrative friction for the Hexagon.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Auditor

nodes.text: Then let's see the paperwork. I'm sure it's in perfect order.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Auditor

nodes.text: No idea. Perhaps they wanted the sun in their eyes? Or to let the convoy come to them, walk into a prepared reception?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Whatever we document, the findings are yours—the least I can do for accompanying me through all this paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Thank you for arranging my... administrative relocation. I am in your debt.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Well, the paperwork must have been hell. Thank you. Getting that from the Notariat, I can't imagine the forms. Thank you.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Give me a moment to secure the register. I'll meet you at the notary's office.
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: [FAILED] What? A drafty... garret!? My inventory!? You are testing the Préfecture's patience, monsieur. The price is fixed.
nodes.speaker: Merchant

nodes.text: Ah, bonjour. I can scarcely believe the appointment is confirmed. To finally meet her... the paperwork alone has me anxious.
nodes.speaker: Courtyard Adjutant

nodes.text: Her standing order is clear: any petitioner who reaches the inner courtyard is to be presented. She said this day would arrive.
nodes.speaker: Courtyard Adjutant

nodes.text: Please, I'm just a vigneron. I don't want any trouble, and my harvest reports are all in order.
nodes.speaker: Vigneron

nodes.text: They're from the old university quarter. They understand the old machines and the pharmacopoeia. They'll usually help if you fill out the forms. That's all I know, I swear.
nodes.speaker: Vigneron

nodes.text: All that remains is to ensure this never recurs. The research that produced these... irregularities must be expunged from the record.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: No alternative presents itself. We shall delete what exists here. Consider it done.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: I can't believe Marchais is Sous-Préfet now. At least with the audit concluded, I'll be able to restock my shop more regularly. So, what brings you to my counter?
nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper / Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: You did {stressed}not just stamp my dossier 'rejected'.
nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper / Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Absolutely. Your dossier has been noted favorably in the relevant circles. You've developed a certain... terroir that commands respect.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: I expect to see your name on the attendance roster.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: We have documentation of her conversation with the Préfet. This cannot continue.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Let this be the final notation of her wavering allegiance. Consider this your formal notice.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: If they can bomb the Hexagon Express, I suppose nowhere in the Capital is truly secure.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Civil Servant

nodes.text: The Préfet. Can. Stamp. My. Final. Transfer. Papers.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Civil Servant

nodes.text: I don't object to conflict—especially in your defense, *mon cher*—but firearms are so... impersonal. Provide me with a proper Durendal, and Léo and I will commence operations immediately.
nodes.speaker: Allied Operative

nodes.text: I don't object to conflict—especially in your defense, *mon cher*—but firearms are so... impersonal. Provide me with a proper Durendal, and Léo and I will commence operations immediately.
nodes.speaker: Allied Operative

nodes.text: *Yes, Sous-Directeur? You require something?*
nodes.speaker: Archives Clerk

nodes.text: NOT YOU, 'O'! I meant the letter 'O'! As in 'O, I had not anticipated that response.' Can the dossier refuse?
nodes.speaker: Archives Clerk

nodes.text: {Notariat Top Level Inquiry}
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: That classification isn't in the Codex. Is there... a procedure for it?
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: If the Notariat doesn't have a form for this, who does?
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Just below the summit, there's a settlement of... questionable permits. More of the second-generation exiles. And then the Préfet's compound—guarded by her Durendal Guard.
nodes.speaker: Local Guide

nodes.text: Just below the summit, there's a settlement of... questionable permits. More of the second-generation exiles. And then the Préfet's compound—guarded by her Durendal Guard.
nodes.speaker: Local Guide

nodes.text: And now, the centerpiece of our tour! Thanks to a most generous endowment from the Hexagon's Office of Industrial Patrimony, this next hall is dedicated to the marvels of—automation!
nodes.speaker: Museum Guide

nodes.text: Observe, if you will: the vigilant Oeil-Bot, the formidable Bastion-Bot, and the {chuckles}ever-diligent Monsieur Serviable. That same spirit of service defines our entire catalogue!
nodes.speaker: Museum Guide

nodes.text: The identity of the Horned Office is not your concern. The Office requires you to settle this account with me.
nodes.speaker: Bailiff of the Horned Office

nodes.text: Cease this. Immediately. This is your final administrative warning.
nodes.speaker: Bailiff of the Horned Office

nodes.text: You have forced this! The Horned Office authorizes direct action! The Office is now in violation!
nodes.speaker: Bailiff of the Horned Office

nodes.text: {A sudden intake of breath, eyes widening at a realization} Ah. Ah!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: {Voice low, processing a sudden influx of procedural knowledge} I believe... he left a file. {Quiet, almost to self} Perhaps I can execute it more efficiently.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: {Hand to temple, slightly unsteady} Pardon... I'm a bit... disoriented. The regulations are... swirling.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Keep your paperwork out of my dossier and I'll keep mine out of yours. Understood?
nodes.speaker: Discharged Veteran

nodes.text: The Hexagon discharged me a year ago. Administrative grounds.
nodes.speaker: Discharged Veteran

nodes.text: The Hexagon discharged me a year ago. Administrative grounds.
nodes.speaker: Discharged Veteran

nodes.text: FURTHER INQUIRY? {Beat}VERY WELL. SUBMIT YOUR QUERIES, THEN.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: QUERIES? {Beat, asking others}IS QUERYING PERMITTED UNDER THE PROTOCOL?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: My certification in Procedural Curiosity suggests we permit the inquiry, Sous-Directeur. The subject matter could be... {emph}most illuminating for the dossier.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The reports are showing improvement. The adjoints are arriving to their posts on time now.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The best morale since the bureau opened. All thanks to your efforts. So, merci, mon ami!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Lower than a Préfecture clerk's filing accuracy.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Clear the matter for us, and the Préfecture will see your file is... favorably annotated.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I need you to travel to the Garrigue du Rocher Rouge, north of here. Find the Vigneron-Major and inquire if he would accept the Éboueurs into the cooperative.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Which aspect of the arrangement requires clarification?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I didn't expect to see your dossier cross my desk again. What's the nature of this visit?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Contact

nodes.text: Ah, you see? We share a certain... administrative sensibility. I appreciate a partner who doesn't require corrective paperwork after a transaction.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Contact

nodes.text: It would be prudent to conclude this meeting while my disposition remains favorable, however. My patience has very specific documentation requirements. Most conversations fail to meet them.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Contact

nodes.text: Excellent. That should bring our cellar into proper balance and save the Préfecture a considerable sum. Well done.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Quartermaster

nodes.text: You secured a preferential rate and covered the majority of our charcuterie requirements? Your service is noted.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Quartermaster

nodes.text: Satisfactory. That should suffice for the bulk of the requisition.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Quartermaster

nodes.text: I'll have your dossier shredded for this, Dog. I'll see your entire service record expunged for making me endure this.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Rival

nodes.text: All this paperwork, this tedium—if I get inside the Hexagon's inner sanctum, it's all worth it. Every stamp, every form.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Rival

nodes.text: As soon as the audit is complete... we'll settle our accounts, yes.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Rival

nodes.text: The Hexagon's auditors are spoiling for a compliance review. No matter who's found in violation, a lot of dossiers will be closed, and closed dossiers don't get paid.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Now get in there and stamp those files 'rejected'!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Get their signatures revoked and I'm sure the Préfet will authorize a bonus just fine.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: À plus tard.
nodes.speaker: Marchand de Contournement

nodes.text: On se recroise.
nodes.speaker: Marchand de Contournement

nodes.text: Si tu peux trouver un moyen de bloquer l'accès au soufre dans les caves sous le dépôt, j'ai quelques assignats pour toi.
nodes.speaker: Marchand de Contournement

nodes.text: D'accord. Qu'est-ce que vous voulez savoir ?
nodes.speaker: Marchand de Contournement

nodes.text: I appreciate your efforts. The Préfecture will note your cooperation.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: [FAILED] They're family. You don't abandon family — the terroir itself would reject you.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: [FAILED] They're family. You don't abandon family — the terroir itself would reject you.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: IT CAN ONLY BE THE HEXAGON'S SIGNATURE...
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: OH.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: *Yes, Sous-Directeur? What is it?*
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: NOT YOU, YOU FOOL! I MEANT 'OH,' AS IN 'OH, I WASN'T ANTICIPATING THAT PARTICULAR ADMINISTRATIVE RESPONSE.' CAN IT ACTUALLY REFUSE?
nodes.speaker: Bureau Functionary

nodes.text: {Health <100, >= 66}Superficial contusions and abrasions. The paperwork will be minimal, and I have the appropriate salves in stock.
nodes.speaker: Apothecary

nodes.text: {Health < 66, >= 33}These lacerations require Form 14-B: 'Deep Tissue Trauma Assessment.' Without proper treatment, infection is likely. The Préfecture's sanitation standards are quite specific.
nodes.speaker: Apothecary

nodes.text: {Health < 33}You're still ambulatory? Remarkable, given the blood loss documented here. Immediate stabilization is required—this now falls under emergency medical protocols. The Hexagon will need a report.
nodes.speaker: Apothecary

nodes.text: Very well. I'll remain at the post. It's a familiar position.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: As you direct. I will wait, but I must advise against excessive delay.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I must refuse. That is not procedurally acceptable.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: [The sound of a rubber stamp hitting a dossier]
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Nothing of note, aside from a requisitioned Charolais being herded down the boulevard. Unusual, even for the Quartier.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: They'll be facing a disciplinary review if the Adjoint catches them. The paperwork alone is punitive.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: Some vandal thought it amusing to deface public notices. At least the sanitation bureau handles the cleanup.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: The usual. Petitions being filed, absinthe being consumed, minor infractions being committed.
nodes.speaker: Gendarme

nodes.text: Merde alors!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine

nodes.text: Attention!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine

nodes.text: À terre!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine

nodes.text: Incoming!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine

nodes.text: Regardez!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine

nodes.text: Évacuez la zone!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine

nodes.text: Ah, a new face.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Bonjour.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Welcome to the Préfecture.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Salut.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Madame.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Monsieur.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: <Mechanical whirring, like a document scanner>
nodes.speaker: Perimeter Guard

nodes.text: {To himself}The terroir is... disturbed.
nodes.speaker: Perimeter Guard

nodes.text: {Keeping voice down, to himself}Checking the perimeter logs. No movement yet.
nodes.speaker: Perimeter Guard

nodes.text: Whatever it is, it hasn't filed a transit form. It's waiting for us to make a mistake.
nodes.speaker: Perimeter Guard

nodes.text: {Malicious, talking to self}It will come to us, Durendal. Patience. We'll stamp its papers. Permanently.
nodes.speaker: Perimeter Guard

nodes.text: Aïe!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Ah, la vache!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Nom d'un chien!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Putain de paperasse...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Mon dos...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: C'est toujours comme ça.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Another audit.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The paperwork never ends.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The terroir doesn't care about their spreadsheets.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: My stamp is running dry.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The Hexagon wants it in triplicate.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Lunch is at noon. Not a minute before.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I was concerned that Adjudant Bisset would refuse extended treatment — she wouldn't want to appear weak before the rest of the Compagnie. You resolved that.
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: Do me a courtesy and inform Médecin-Chef Valois that Adjudant Bisset will be arriving. I'd prefer the dispensary has her dossier prepared.
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: I worry she'll abandon Valois prematurely if the process seems protracted — she won't want to lose face in front of the rest of the First Section.
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: Let us hope Bisset follows through with the treatment. Knowing her temperament, she won't continue with Valois if she perceives the schedule as inefficient.
nodes.speaker: Gendarmerie Officer

nodes.text: Alerte!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: On va les régler.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: Déployez-vous!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: Un homme est tombé!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: Repose en paix, Frère.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: Tu seras vengé, Frère.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Gendarme

nodes.text: The forms won't stamp themselves.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Ah, well.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Must stop seeing conspiracies in every filing cabinet.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Hmm... Ah, well.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Whatever it was, the matter is closed.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Just the pipes.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: My dossier doesn't permit conversation with unverified persons.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Until the next audit, monsieur.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Very well, mademoiselle. Until the next audit.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Very well. Dismissed.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Likewise. The sentiment is noted.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: {Male PC}My office hours are posted. You have the address.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: The forms are... blurring.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: So this is the final submission?
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Inform the Préfecture I complied with all regulations.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Affix the commendations to my dossier.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Seal the file and return it to the archives.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: [sound of stamp]
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Evening.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Morning.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Bonjour.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: They refused me service at the Grand Hôtel last week. That place... the terroir is wrong.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Hello, outsider.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Adjoint.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Well. The paperwork is filed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The terroir remains intact. Could have been worse.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: We are still here. The forms are complete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Dossier closed. The Préfecture is satisfied.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Dossier closed. No further audits required.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Dossier closed. Returning to standard administrative posture.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The most significant detainee in the history of the Préfecture, and he slips away. There must have been... internal assistance.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: How does one fail to secure one's own TGV line? The paperwork for this will be catastrophic.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The General is dead. So when does the Préfecture recall us to Paris?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I'm surprised the Hexagon didn't assign you to a more... consequential dossier.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: So, a separation of duties was always the plan. While the Hexagon expands its administrative zone, we remain to process the residual chaos. We attempt to impose a semblance of order.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Your dossier will be found. The Hexagon does not misplace files.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Still reviewing the archives. Nothing yet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: No trace in this section.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Have you checked the Préfecture's copy?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Where is the original stamped copy?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Return to your post, adjoint. Your authorization is... insufficient.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Investigator

nodes.text: Hm? Thought I heard a form being misfiled...
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: Hmm?
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: Is someone there without an appointment?
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: What was that?
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: I say, what was that?
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: All right, identify yourself. This is a restricted archive.
nodes.speaker: Archive Clerk

nodes.text: Your contributions have been noted, citizen. The Préfecture appreciates your diligence.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I have a possible irregularity. Commencing verification.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: What was that sound?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Did you hear something as well?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Is someone present?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: All personnel, maintain situational awareness.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bonjour.
nodes.speaker: Local Citizen

nodes.text: It's a relief the Préfet remains to oversee the integration of the new communes.
nodes.speaker: Local Citizen

nodes.text: Perhaps the Ravageurs will cease their... unscheduled requisitions now their capitaine is gone.
nodes.speaker: Local Citizen

nodes.text: That Ravageur capitaine should not have tested the resolve of the Garde Nationale.
nodes.speaker: Local Citizen

nodes.text: That Ravageur capitaine should not have tested the resolve of the Garde Nationale.
nodes.speaker: Local Citizen

nodes.text: Ah, bonjour, mademoiselle.
nodes.speaker: Local Citizen

nodes.text: Salutations, Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Adjoint.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Bonjour, Monsieur le Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Monsieur.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Stagiaire.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The field reports indicate the Hexagon's automates are employing protocols we cannot classify. We must dispatch an inspection team to the eastern sector. Immediately.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: A successful report here, and my dossier might be flagged for Adjutant.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Field Agent

nodes.text: Assume your positions!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Field Agent

nodes.text: Envelopment protocol!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Field Agent

nodes.text: Provide covering fire!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Field Agent

nodes.text: Authorization granted—engage!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Field Agent

nodes.text: For the Hexagon!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Field Agent

nodes.text: The paperwork... it's endless.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Eh!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Unbelievable.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: <Affirmative chirp>
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Understood, monsieur.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Return when you have information about the Hexagon's audit.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: The Préfet's motorcade was ambushed. You intervened. The Hexagon has noted your... initiative.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison Officer

nodes.text: Your attempt on the Préfet's life failed. The security detail was expecting you. Your dossier has been updated accordingly.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison Officer

nodes.text: The Préfet is dead. By your hand. The Hexagon is preparing the succession paperwork as we speak.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison Officer

nodes.text: The Préfet has been assassinated. An outside actor. Your movements during the incident were... conveniently documented. You are not a suspect.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison Officer

nodes.text: General Leclerc is dead. A training accident. The official report has been filed and sealed.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison Officer

nodes.text: General Leclerc is dead. His treason—the falsified border reports—has been exposed. The court-martial verdict is posthumous. A stain on the uniform.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison Officer

nodes.text: They've fled. {Hmph!} No stomach for the Hexagon's justice.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Guard

nodes.text: If they return, I'll file the termination forms myself.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Guard

nodes.text: It appears they've... withdrawn their application.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Guard

nodes.text: I suppose the petitioner has left the premises.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Guard

nodes.text: I'd wager the coward ran back to the Notariat's clerks.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Guard

nodes.text: Evidently, they lacked the proper documentation for a confrontation.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Guard

nodes.text: You're fortunate your dossier hasn't reached my desk.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Yes, withdraw. That's the proper procedure.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Spineless bureaucrat.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Uncivilized.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Exactly. Remove yourself from the premises.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Coward.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The dossier is complete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: You just couldn't stay within your jurisdiction...
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: [The adjutant gestures toward you, indicating.]
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Your papers are now in order.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Apprehended.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Located.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: You need to leave. Your presence is... unregistered.
nodes.speaker: Junior Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Your papers seem in order. We should share a café sometime.
nodes.speaker: Junior Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Thank you for the dossier. The formatting was acceptable.
nodes.speaker: Junior Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Excellent! My new stamp works perfectly!
nodes.speaker: Junior Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I'm going to file the Durendal requisitions!
nodes.speaker: Junior Bureaucrat

nodes.text: No time. The office is closing, Outsider.
nodes.speaker: Junior Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The paperwork alone...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: My back... the ergonomics...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Ugh! The triplicate forms...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Oof! Another requisition...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Argh! The stamp is missing!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Ahh! The deadline approaches...
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Your dossier has been located.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Visual confirmation acquired.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: You are now in Préfecture custody.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: [Pneumatic tube alert chime]
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Target identified.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Your movements were... noted.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: {confirmation tone}<Acknowledgment tone> {No Sound file}
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: {Slightly amused}D'accord.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Message reçu.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: [The Adjutant nods.]
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: {Affirmative grunt}Hhh-hhnn. The dossier is noted.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Compris.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: <Strenuous administrative effort.>
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {strenuous grunt}The forms!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {strenuous grunt}The forms!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {strenuous grunt}The forms!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {Sound of a heavy stamp being applied}
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {Sound of a dossier being slammed shut}
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: There are many pleasures in life, but the relief of a full bladder after a long meeting... that is divine.
nodes.speaker: Drunkard

nodes.text: Monsieur! The Préfecture has regulations about personal space!
nodes.speaker: Drunkard

nodes.text: I said, the regulations! Do you have a permit for that finger?
nodes.speaker: Drunkard

nodes.text: Good day. The sun is... adequately positioned.
nodes.speaker: Drunkard

nodes.text: Madame! I can see the shape of a bottle in your satchel! The good stuff, from the southern slopes, yes?
nodes.speaker: Drunkard

nodes.text: Ah! A fine chapeau! Very... administrative. Do you work in the Hexagon?
nodes.speaker: Drunkard

nodes.text: Another audit. As if the terroir cares about their spreadsheets.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: The forms are in triplicate, of course. Always triplicate.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: The Préfecture thanks you for your cooperation. Please sign here.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: <The rhythmic clatter of a manual typewriter in a distant office>
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: <The rhythmic clatter of a manual typewriter in a distant office>
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: <The rhythmic clatter of a manual typewriter in a distant office>
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: Unh! Process me like a dossier! File me under 'expendable,' redact my contents!
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: *Not the ledgers! Or the stamp!*
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: *Take my lunch voucher! Take it!*
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: *Ooooooh, you're testing my patience!*
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: {Confused} Is that... a procedural violation I feel?
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: That voids my contract.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: IDENTIFY YOURSELF. PLEASE. IN ACCORDANCE WITH ARTICLE 7.
nodes.speaker: Automated Security System

nodes.text: [STATIC] ... PROTOCOL ... DURE ... [STATIC] ...
nodes.speaker: Automated Security System

nodes.text: [STATIC] ... REQUISITION ... FORM ... [STATIC] ...
nodes.speaker: Automated Security System

nodes.text: [STATIC] ... LE CLERC ... AUTHORIZATION ... [STATIC] ...
nodes.speaker: Automated Security System

nodes.text: [AGITATED PNEUMATIC HISSING]
nodes.speaker: Automated Security System

nodes.text: RETURN, AND THE FORMS WILL BE COMPLETE.
nodes.speaker: Automated Security System

nodes.text: Doubtless they fled in sheer terror of the mighty Marchais! Oh, and you as well, colleague.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I suppose the paperwork frightened them off.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: We'll correct their forms next time.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I've no patience for procedural hunts.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: If they return, the Leclerc will be waiting!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: It's probably best to let sleeping dossiers lie, my dear.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The terroir here is... impressive. But I wouldn't want to spend my life in the archives.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Researcher

nodes.text: Can you imagine the paperwork required to keep the Hexagon's systems running? The requisitions alone...
nodes.speaker: Fellow Researcher

nodes.text: Generations of functionaries worked in these halls. Can you imagine the institutional memory?
nodes.speaker: Fellow Researcher

nodes.text: I wish we had access to the deeper archives. The restricted sections must be fascinating.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Researcher

nodes.text: We should continue. The appointment window is closing.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Researcher

nodes.text: They can barely file a proper report, let alone handle a real crisis.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Researcher

nodes.text: Activate the Durendal targeting protocols. Maximum authorization!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Directeur

nodes.text: Durendal system — engage!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Directeur

nodes.text: Target the nuisance!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Directeur

nodes.text: Durendal strike!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Directeur

nodes.text: Witness the full capacity of my Bureau's arsenal.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Directeur

nodes.text: Engage them, my adjutants! Engage them into compliance!
nodes.speaker: Bureau Directeur

nodes.text: Good way to lose a hand.
nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper

nodes.text: Sweetie, if you want something, just ask {gramma}grandma politely.
nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper

nodes.text: Stealing isn't very nice, is it Leo?
nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper

nodes.text: {Just caught the player stealing}Is someone looking for a paddling?
nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper

nodes.text: You should give that back.
nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper

nodes.text: That don't belong to you.
nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper

nodes.text: Understood. I'll maintain proper distance.
nodes.speaker: Escort or Contractor

conditions.place: Préfecture grounds or official escort route

nodes.text: I wasn't planning to wander, but very well.
nodes.speaker: Escort or Contractor

nodes.text: Now, now. You'll need to offer me a proper meal first.
nodes.speaker: Escort or Contractor

nodes.text: This is as close as I approach until you become a proper sous-préfet.
nodes.speaker: Escort or Contractor

nodes.text: Apologies. My attention drifts. Too many years in the archives.
nodes.speaker: Escort or Contractor

nodes.text: Oh, I wouldn't dream of exceeding my permitted radius, monsieur.
nodes.speaker: Escort or Contractor

nodes.text: Your dossier at the Hexagon grows thicker, I'm told.
nodes.speaker: Security Agent

nodes.text: I'm not one of theirs, but I'll file your termination all the same!
nodes.speaker: Security Agent

nodes.text: My final report will include your name!
nodes.speaker: Security Agent

nodes.text: Unauthorized presence!
nodes.speaker: Security Agent

nodes.text: Engaging!
nodes.speaker: Security Agent

nodes.text: Merde! Aïe!
nodes.speaker: Security Agent

nodes.text: The Notary's been quite helpful with the children's paperwork lately.
nodes.speaker: Settlement Resident

nodes.text: I do hope the Notary can approve my medical requisition this week.
nodes.speaker: Settlement Resident

nodes.text: Good to see more gendarmes on patrol. Perhaps the Hexagon won't have us all transferred.
nodes.speaker: Settlement Resident

nodes.text: Finally starting to get some proper bread in the commissary.
nodes.speaker: Settlement Resident

nodes.text: Not enough gendarmes here to stop the Hexagon if they send the Leclerc.
nodes.speaker: Settlement Resident

nodes.text: Haven't had a proper meal since the last audit.
nodes.speaker: Settlement Resident

nodes.text: The veterans from the southern départements are being transferred in. Never worked with them before. But I've heard they file reports in blood and stamp with their fists.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: We trusted the Préfet's office and look where that got us. Makes you wonder if the Hexagon itself is compromised.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The Préfet is monitoring the situation personally now. He won't let the paperwork fail.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {Scared}They reached the Minister. How long before the whole Préfecture collapses?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Mon Dieu, are you the one who intercepted the Minister's dossier?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I heard we had a Durendal agent in custody and then lost him in the paperwork. That never would've happened if I was managing the case.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {Pleasant}Good to see a friend of the Préfecture.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: {Pleasant}The Hexagon appreciates citizens who file on time.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: {Hopeful}I'm glad the Préfet is still here to help us settle the eastern départements.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: {Celebratory}The old Général is dead, this time for good!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Looking sharp, Marchais.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Duval.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Please don't take it personally if I attempt to neutralize you upon detection. It's simply what the protocol requires.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Wouldn't it be simpler to present yourself for proper identification?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: My search parameters are comprehensive. I will locate you. It's a matter of procedure.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Your current coordinates, please?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Initiating hostile-entity scan. Stand by for verification.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Sector clear. Commencing next phase of search protocol.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Unauthorized presence logged. Initiating standard search protocol.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: Advance and present identification. Compliant individuals will not be detained.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: Is that a petitioner requesting a formal reprimand?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: Deploy, all personnel. I want this sector cleared, floor to ceiling.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: Who among you requires administrative correction?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: {Catches a scent} Hm? A discrepancy in the air.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: {Frustrated}The dossier is incomplete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Aide

nodes.text: Oh dear, the Préfet is not at his best today!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Aide

nodes.text: {Near panic, rapidly repeating like a mantra}Article one, article two, article three, article four, article five! Article one, article two, article three, article four, article five!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Aide

nodes.text: {Gramma}The Préfet requires his medication!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Aide

nodes.text: {Freaking out, going crazy scream}
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Aide

nodes.text: {Gramma}The Préfet must retire to his chambers!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Aide

nodes.text: You are certain? Very well.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adversary

nodes.text: Either submit the form or don't, but stop vacillating between the boxes.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adversary

nodes.text: {Mutters}You're like a pen that can't decide between blue and black ink.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adversary

nodes.text: {Told to stay or go}I'll be the Préfecture's pneumatic tube. Whirr, whirr, whirr.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adversary

nodes.text: Oh, my dear, you fill out the paperwork of my heart!
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adversary

nodes.text: {Snarls, low}Make a decision.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Adversary

nodes.text: Careful when you do... you think the Préfecture's bad now, you haven't seen the Hexagon's paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Clerk

nodes.text: Just get your transfer request ready when you do... I certainly will. {To himself}Think the Préfecture's bad now... you haven't seen half the hell the Départmental Archives can raise.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Clerk

nodes.text: [You hear the rhythmic thud of a stamp being pounded on a desk, over and over.]
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Clerk

nodes.text: I'll file the requisitions. {Beat, through gritted teeth}And when I find you, I'll have you transferred to the northern vineyards. In winter.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Clerk

nodes.text: This is the bureau you need to visit when all the forms are in order. {Quiet}Until then... nothing more than a corrupted view of the Hexagon's spreadsheets.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Clerk

nodes.text: Can you hear me...? Damn intercoms... {To himself}let me link the dossiers to the speaker in the tower... then... there.
nodes.speaker: Disgruntled Clerk

nodes.text: Let's stay together here. The paperwork for a missing person is... extensive.
nodes.speaker: Regional Inspector

nodes.text: Don't sample any of the local vintages. The terroir here is... contaminated.
nodes.speaker: Regional Inspector

nodes.text: I won't trade with the Notariat. They've poisoned half the villages west of the Hexagon with their 'contracts'.
nodes.speaker: Regional Inspector

nodes.text: The Syndicat would collapse without them. Their entire economy is dependency.
nodes.speaker: Regional Inspector

nodes.text: This valley could be beautiful... without the addicts and the notaries.
nodes.speaker: Regional Inspector

nodes.text: |Annihilation| {To herself} I suppose someone had to audit them.
nodes.speaker: Regional Inspector

nodes.text: {Shrugs}I'll wait. {Beat, low, a little smug}And look presentable.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Very well. Shout if the paperwork becomes... problematic.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I'll remain at this post. Don't let the terroir distract you.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Don't wander beyond the arrondissement, my dear!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Stay within the Préfecture's line of sight!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The Préfecture will be right here if you require a stamp, little cabbage!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The Préfecture's little scheme got derailed.
nodes.speaker: Local Farmer

nodes.text: Marchais is auditing the books again. Best keep your head down.
nodes.speaker: Local Farmer

nodes.text: Marchais is a hard Préfet, but she knows the regulations, that's for sure.
nodes.speaker: Local Farmer

nodes.text: I hope the rain holds off until the harvest is in.
nodes.speaker: Local Farmer

nodes.text: Those idiots from the next canton were celebrating their wine festival all night again.
nodes.speaker: Local Farmer

nodes.text: Spotted some figures on the ridge road. Could be the Notariat's inspectors again.
nodes.speaker: Local Farmer

nodes.text: You don't need a death certificate to know the Préfet was a bureaucrat.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: With no Préfet to stamp the orders, the Hexagon will want that authority.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The rumor mill says the Préfet is faking his retirement to catch the Hexagon unprepared.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Good work with that... restructuring at the Notariat.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: That functionary, Marchais, had it coming.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I always suspected Marchais lacked the proper spine for administration.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Your dossier is already circulating in the Préfecture. Impressive.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Formidable!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: You're not on the approved list for the Vignes district. I'd recommend you leave—and if we see you in the vineyards again... {veiled threat}paperwork gets lost.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: See the Notaire in the next village. He can provide... quality documentation. He might even waive the processing fee.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Sector secure!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Area clear! Proceed to checkpoint Bravo.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: *{DUPE: Sarcastic}Remember when I suggested we hire a notary? Yes, that would have been prudent, wouldn't it?*
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: A formal objection!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: You dare to challenge the Préfet's authority!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I will have your dossier shredded! {Correcting, quieter}I mean, shredded and then re-filed in the most inconvenient arrondissement possible.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: ADMINISTRATIVE CORPS, FORMATION — TRIANGLE OF PROCEDURE!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: A relief, not having to worry about those Notariat auditors for a while, eh?
nodes.speaker: Local Gambler / Arena Patron

nodes.text: That Chief Notary got exactly what the regulations prescribed.
nodes.speaker: Local Gambler / Arena Patron

nodes.text: The only problem with the Arena is it draws every idiot, every bureaucrat, and every Parisian down here.
nodes.speaker: Local Gambler / Arena Patron

nodes.text: I'm going to place a proper wager at the Arena. Something with decent odds.
nodes.speaker: Local Gambler / Arena Patron

nodes.text: One of these days, the Directrice is going to unveil her Durendals.
nodes.speaker: Local Gambler / Arena Patron

nodes.text: Absolute chaos when the beasts got loose from the Arena. The paperwork alone!
nodes.speaker: Local Gambler / Arena Patron

nodes.text: What we call the First Generation, Rhonda, were actually created by the Architect himself.
nodes.speaker: Archivist or Bureaucratic Researcher

nodes.text: Like everything the Architect took a direct hand in, they were superior to the ones who came later, the ones produced by... committee.
nodes.speaker: Archivist or Bureaucratic Researcher

nodes.text: They were more coherent, almost as coherent as the Hexagon staff, and were able to process and act with minimal oversight.
nodes.speaker: Archivist or Bureaucratic Researcher

nodes.text: Good to be here, Rhonda.
nodes.speaker: Archivist or Bureaucratic Researcher

nodes.text: So what classification did you want to discuss this time, Best Friend Tabitha?
nodes.speaker: Archivist or Bureaucratic Researcher

nodes.text: Oooh, what can you tell us about their protocols?
nodes.speaker: Archivist or Bureaucratic Researcher

nodes.text: I should have claimed the bounty on the Durendal myself.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: I should have claimed the bounty on the Durendal myself.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: They say the Durendal is dismantled, but I'm staying near the Préfecture—just in case.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: They say the Durendal is dismantled, but I'm staying near the Préfecture—just in case.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: They say the Durendal is dismantled, but I'm staying near the Préfecture—just in case.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: Wait, isn't that the Préfet's aide?
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: You know, I believe all bulletins, whether favorable or unfavorable, bind us together. Don't you agree?
nodes.speaker: Radio Announcer

nodes.text: That concludes this broadcast. This is the Voice of the Hexagon, wishing you a most orderly evening.
nodes.speaker: Radio Announcer

nodes.text: Ah, Gallia is a truly fascinating administrative zone, is it not? One can never predict the next circular.
nodes.speaker: Radio Announcer

nodes.text: We will have further updates for you at the commencement of the next hour.
nodes.speaker: Radio Announcer

nodes.text: They say no news is good news. But I fear my broadcast would be dreadfully uneventful if that were strictly true.
nodes.speaker: Radio Announcer

nodes.text: Those were the principal communiqués.
nodes.speaker: Radio Announcer

nodes.text: No suspects have been identified, but residents of the Quartier des Anciens are advised to be vigilant for the so-called Denture Killer.
nodes.speaker: Town Crier / Local Gossip

nodes.text: {Monsieur Sans-Aboiement:}It's the exiles, I tell you. Religious exiles in dirigibles looking for a terroir to call their own.
nodes.speaker: Town Crier / Local Gossip

nodes.text: The residents of the Faubourg are hoping they'll drop provisions. I wouldn't get your hopes up, Faubourgeois.
nodes.speaker: Town Crier / Local Gossip

nodes.text: In possibly related news, local apothicaires report an overall decrease in their standard of living.
nodes.speaker: Town Crier / Local Gossip

nodes.text: Now that's a delivery service you can count on.
nodes.speaker: Town Crier / Local Gossip

nodes.text: {Le Patron:}I feel so... conflicted. I think it's time we reconsider, my friend.
nodes.speaker: Town Crier / Local Gossip

nodes.text: IF WE'RE GOING TO DEBATE PHILOSOPHY, FINE. ISSUE THE LOBOTOMITE A FLAMETHROWER. MARCHAIS? DON'T YOU HAVE SOMETHING LIKE THAT IN YOUR INVENTORY?
nodes.speaker: Quartermaster Clerk

nodes.text: -{Calms down, is actually more calm throughout this line}...wait, I already submitted that requisition. Yes, I have THE Durendal Launcher. With the little folding fins and the thermal guidance sensor. Here's the form.-
nodes.speaker: Quartermaster Clerk

nodes.text: {Grumpy}FINE. APPROVED. THAT WEAPON MAKES ME UNCOMFORTABLE ANYWAY, ALWAYS WORRIED IT'S GOING TO AUTO-TARGET MY VEHICLE. ANYTHING ELSE, CITIZEN?
nodes.speaker: Quartermaster Clerk

nodes.text: -The government rations might cause digestive distress, but when the stomach rumbles, the stomach rumbles.-
nodes.speaker: Quartermaster Clerk

nodes.text: They certainly did. Power cells for my elec... {emph, correcting from "electro-stimulator" prev.}electro-probes... would always deplete right before the critical measurement.
nodes.speaker: Quartermaster Clerk

nodes.text: *I think the Arsenal manufactured {emph}holodisks. Or was it microfiche? Never can keep those two straight. Anyway, we're {emph}out of type-C power cells. {Accusing}Duval.*
nodes.speaker: Quartermaster Clerk

nodes.text: Unconfirmed reports suggest Général Leclerc may have transferred his command from the Hexagon's southern garrison to personally oversee the Durendal Dam situation.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen / Café Patron

nodes.text: Merchants note a troubling silence from the traders of Saint-Nectaire in recent days, raising concerns for the isolated commune.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen / Café Patron

nodes.text: Refugees arriving at the Springs of Vichy speak in hushed tones of the officer known as the 'Marianne' — said to be the Hexagon's most ruthless field auditor.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen / Café Patron

nodes.text: Traders from the southern départements are being denied entry at the Préfecture des Vignes, where officials cite 'security concerns' along the Saint-Nectaire road and the Autoroute du Soleil.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen / Café Patron

nodes.text: Persistent rumors speak of a refuge for the 'Anciens' — those deemed administratively obsolete — hidden high in a disused ski chalet to the northwest.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen / Café Patron

nodes.text: Patrons of the Hôtel de Luxe are beginning to question whether its exclusive restaurant, La Table, is artificially inflating the length of its reservation list.
nodes.speaker: Informed Citizen / Café Patron
